data.1: I CALL THIS earth to witness --
data.2: And you are free to live upon it, --
data.3: And the parent and the offspring,
data.4: That We created man in toil and trouble.
data.5: Does he think that no one has power over him?
data.6: He says: "I have wasted a great deal of wealth."
data.7: Does he think that no one sees him?
data.8: Did We not give him two eyes,
data.10: And showed him two highways (of good and evil)?
data.11: But he could not scale the steep ascent.
data.12: How will you comprehend what the Steep ascent is? --
data.13: To free a neck (from the burden of debt or slavery),
data.14: Or to feed in times of famine
data.17: And to be of those who believe, and urge upon one another to persevere, and urge upon each other to be kind.
data.18: They are the people of the right hand (and will succeed).
data.19: But those who deny Our revelations are the people of the left hand:
data.20: The Fire will vault them over.
